name: Crumbled
description:
To win in this game you need to build the house from bricks and planks, as is shown on the blueprint.

Left Mouse Button - pick a brick. Hold the button to drag it on the spot you want, on the building area. CAREFUL: If you pick a brick from beneath the construction, it could lead to the whol construction's crumble. If you want to adjust a brick already inside the construction do it very quickly.
Right Mouse Button - you can use a duct tape to fix the bricks in place and protect the construction from the cataclysms (note: The duct tape is not finished in principle, please use at your own discretion)

R - rotate the bricks and planks

M - mutes the game (might or might not be working, something went wrong)
